briefTitle: Prospective Registry Trial for Single Port Robot-assisted Nipple Sparing Mastectomy (SPrNSM)
officialTitle: Prospective Registry Trial for Single Port Robot-assisted Nipple Sparing Mastectomy
conditions: Anatomic Stage IA Breast Cancer AJCC v8, Anatomic Stage IB Breast Cancer AJCC v8, Anatomic Stage IIA Breast Cancer AJCC v8, Anatomic Stage II Breast Cancer AJCC v8, Anatomic Stage I Breast Cancer AJCC v8, Anatomic Stage IIB Breast Cancer AJCC v8, Anatomic Stage IIIA Breast Cancer AJCC v8, Ductal Carcinoma in Situ, Prognostic Stage I Breast Cancer AJCC v8, Prognostic Stage II Breast Cancer AJCC v8, BRCA1 Mutation, BRCA2 Mutation
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Feasibility of completion of SPrNSM through axillary incision
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Subjects age \>= 18 years who undergo robotic nipple sparing mastectomy and breast reconstruction with prosthesis at UTSW

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Subjects who are \<18 years of age
2. Subjects who do not undergo robotic nipple sparing mastectomy and breast reconstruction with prosthesis at UTSW
